title: Train Sim World® 5: Cargo Line Vol. 4 - Military
description: Discover different freight traffic with Skyhook Games’ Cargo Line for Train Sim World®. In Volume 4, take charge of the more secretive movements across the UK rail network; the transportation of military vehicles secured aboard KWA Warwell wagons.
longDescription:
It’s not all about passengers out there – discover different freight traffic with Skyhook Games’ Cargo Line for Train Sim World®. In Volume 4, take charge of the more secretive movements across the UK rail network; the transportation of military vehicles secured aboard KWA Warwell wagons.

The KWA Warwell wagon was introduced to the UK amidst the Second World War. These wagons feature a low profile for being laden with large equipment while keeping within Britain’s restrictive loading gauge. The days of mass-importing Sherman tanks from across the pond have long since passed , but the railways still provide a vital role in modern national security. Rail-served Ministry of Defence sites are still dotted about the country to this day, and many pieces of equipment are still transported between them.

Across a new selection of scenarios, take on the task of hauling MoD equipment along two routes and two eras. Dodge modern Great Western Express commuter traffic on military movements between Reading and Acton Main Line, and brush up on 1980s nostalgia by shifting equipment over Shap. GWE scenarios use the Class 66 included in this pack, WCML: Preston - Carlisle scenarios use its own Class 47 locos.

Military services can be found in their own WCML Preston - Carlisle timetable, as well as in the base Great Western Express timetable.

With Free Roam and Formation Designer, embark across any route of your choosing to deliver dutiful equipment. Put your fleet of locomotives to the test on the vital flow of secretive defensive freight.

Please Note: For the full experience, we recommend you own Train Sim World 5: Great Western Express and WCML: Preston - Carlisle which are available as separate purchases.

Despite the name and nature of this Add-On, no weapons or conflicts are represented or referenced in-game.

# Key Features

- KWA Warwell wagon in weathered military green livery in 3 variants;
- Unloaded/Empty
- Loaded with Armed Personnel Carrier (APC)
- Loaded with Mine-Resistant Ambush Protected Vehicle (MRAP)

- BR Class 66 locomotive in DB Cargo UK Red livery
- Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cab
- True-to-life performance, suspension and handling
- 3x scenarios each for Great Western Express and Just Trains’ WCML: Preston - Carlisle
- Dedicated Cargo Line Vol. 4 version of WCML: Preston - Carlisle timetable
- Additional freight layer in Great Western Express timetable
- Livery Designer, Formation Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club
- Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
